name: NES SMM Color Palette (FOR EMULATORS)
description:
This is a color palette for NES emulators that replicates that of Super Mario Maker™ (SMM) 1 & 2 for Wii U & Switch. Most of these colors were picked out of the SMB1 Game Style, but some had to be taken from the SMB3 Game Style as well. We've had dozens of different palettes for emulators that replicates those from the Virtual Consoles, the NES Classic, Composite display from the NES itself, and even one for the obscure PlayChoice 10, but no one had made one from SMM yet. So I made that my mission & decided to spend my time on an NES color palette that replicates that of SMM.

I'm working hard to make this as accurate as possible. Any suggestions for color corrections or color changes would be very appreciated. I am willing to keep this project up as much as possible.
